channel.title: Handler Help
channel.description:
i compile my server files with no errors
once i run my server i get this
[code]Westscape Server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at Castlewars.<init>(Castlewars.java:12) at server.main(server.java:149) [/code]
i go to line 12 in my castlewars handler i have this
[code]public stream inStream = null, outStream = null;
int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();[/code]
this is my line 12
[code]int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();[/code]
server.java this is my line 149
[code]Castlewars= new Castlewars();[/code]
tell me what i did wrong?

item.title: Handler Help
item.dc:creator: @moody757 moody757
item.description:
@moody757 wrote:

i compile my server files with no errors

once i run my server i get this

Westscape Server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at Castlewars.<init>(Castlewars.java:12) at server.main(server.java:149)

i go to line 12 in my castlewars handler i have this

[code]public stream inStream = null, outStream = null;

		int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
		int objectID = inStream.readUnsignedWord();
		int objectY = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();[/code]

this is my line 12

int objectX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();

server.java this is my line 149

Castlewars= new Castlewars();

tell me what i did wrong?

Read full topic
